SUPER STARS - From Billy Meredity Mattias Sindelar , to Pele , Alfredo Di Stefano , Garrincha , Maradona and Zidane , the careers of players who shined and left their indelible and permanent mark on football history . Two players have won the World Cup almost single-handedly : Maradona in 1986 , and Garrincha in 1962 , however, their private lives show different stories . . Garrincha died of alcoholism and those who knew him tell his story . And Maradona reveals , exclusively, how difficult it is to quit drugs . Interviews with : Pele , Alfredo Di Stefano , Zidane , Paolo Maldini , Pepi Bican , George Best and Antonio Rava .

PRESS RELEASE - The first newspaper stories about the football field were transferred to newsrooms by archaic means. In the 90s , the TV starts to encourage the growing wealth of the sport and we have examined the role of media has changed the lives of athletes . Respondents George Best, JÃƒÂ¼rgen Klinsmann and Ronaldo count as they are treated and suffering that the press caused them . Interviews with Sir Alex Ferguson , David Hill , Joao Havelange , Diego Maradona , Pele and Ronaldo .
